test.common
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  test.common.Logger

public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains methods and fields for handling the log process

simpleLog

public void simpleLog(java.lang.String s)
Simple print a string: if current logger system is set to "txt file" or "console", the string is print on out, otherwise (HTML) it's append in Body section

Parameters:
s - The string to be printed
